$interpreted: Elio: It should be...safe here...right...
Theodore: Ugh... Where am I...?
Elio: This is on the desert's border. We are safe now, father.
Theodore: ...F-Father!?
Theodore: Those wings on your back...and your face...could it be...that you're really Shirley's...
Elio: Yes...
Theodore: Hahaha, how ironic!
Theodore: When I was Regent, I tried desperately to hide this part of my past. Now, the very moment I lost power, my past came back to haunt me.
Elio: Hide?
Theodore: The next heir to the throne had a child with a lowly demihuman. Did you really think I would allow something like that to be made public?
Theodore: For the past 18 years, your existence has been a thorn in my side!
Elio: T-The past is the past. We shouldn't dwell on it...
Elio: Father, please. Stop this pursuit of power. We can find a quiet place so you can live peacefully together with mother until your time comes...
Theodore: Mother?
Elio: Yes. You kept her in custody somewhere, right? We should get her out, then...
Theodore: I killed her.
Theodore: You didn't know?
Theodore: On my way to the top, I've buried so many bodies that I can no longer keep count. What makes you think that I would let that stain in my life survive?
Elio: ...You're kidding...
Theodore: I'm not. The sensation of the dagger plunging into your mother's chest, the painful expression on her face...
Elio: Stop it...
Theodore: ... Every night, I relive that experience.
Elio: No......
Theodore: Do you want me to describe that experience in detail for you?
Elio: SHUT UP!!!!
Theodore: Yes, at the very least, you should do the right thing for the sake of your mother.
Theodore: Kill me, and avenge Shirley!
Elio: ARRGGHHH!!
Elio: Ugh...*cough*...*cough*...argh...
Theodore: You can't do it, can you?...
Theodore: ...Hmph, you're not like me at all...
Theodore: Karen, why are you here? I don't remember giving you such an order...
Karen: One, I can make my own judgments. I don't have to rely on orders to live.
Karen: Two, It was my choice to come here...
Theodore: ...Fair enough. Take me away from this place.
Karen: About this child of the Feather Clan, shall I finish him off?
Theodore: I wanted to kill him to ensure there were no obstacles on my path to the throne.
Theodore: Now, it would be meaningless.
Elio: F-Father...
Theodore: Don't call me father! I forbid you to show yourself in front of me, nor are you allowed to mention my name!
Theodore: .........
Theodore: I have no connection to a bastard like you!
Elio: Damn you...damn you!
Elio: What am I to do...?

Damn you...damn you!
